identified_cold_spots.reality_gap: Testing coverage significantly underrepresented in implementation domain
identified_cold_spots.impact_assessment: HIGH - Code quality degradation due to insufficient test validation

identified_cold_spots.reality_gap: Architectural decisions poorly documented, creating knowledge silos
Security considerations isolated from integration workflows
identified_cold_spots.impact_assessment: HIGH - Vulnerability introduction via integration paths

detected_asymmetries.description: Reality records (173) significantly exceed Intent records (93)
Agent 6 has 25 outcomes vs Agent 1 has 3 outcomes

priority_high.title: Implement Cross-Domain Validation Matrix
priority_high.description: Create mandatory validation checkpoints between cold spot category pairs
implementation_steps: Define validation protocols for identified cold spot pairs
Integrate validation gates into CI/CD pipeline
Create automated reporting for cross-domain coverage

priority_high.title: Address Process Health Crisis
priority_high.description: Emergency intervention for 6.91% Process Health grade
success_metrics: Process Health grade improvement to C+ (>75%)
implementation_steps: Root cause analysis of process bottlenecks
Implement process automation for repetitive tasks

priority_medium.title: Balance Intent-Reality Documentation
priority_medium.description: Reduce 18.5x asymmetry between Reality (173) and Intent (93) records
success_metrics: Documentation coverage for all major features
implementation_steps: Audit existing implementations without intent documentation
Create templates for intent capture before implementation

priority_low.title: Optimize Agent Workload Distribution
priority_low.description: Rebalance pipeline to reduce Agent 6 concentration (25 vs 3 outcomes)
success_metrics: More even outcome distribution across agents
implementation_steps: Analyze outcome complexity and redistribution opportunities

narrative_summaries.executive_summary: Trust Debt analysis reveals a system with good architectural foundations (B grade, 0.952 orthogonality) but severe operational challenges (6.91% Process Health). The 18.5x Intent-Reality asymmetry indicates reactive development patterns, while identified cold spots in Testing-Implementation (0.23 ratio) and Documentation-Architecture (0.18 ratio) represent critical vulnerability zones.
key_insights: Matrix sparsity analysis identified 3 critical cold spots with 0.56 coverage deficit
Process Health F grade (6.91%) indicates systemic operational dysfunction requiring immediate intervention
Intent-Reality drift (18.5x ratio) suggests documentation debt accumulation
Category orthogonality excellence (0.952) provides solid foundation for systematic improvements

immediate_risks: Process Health crisis threatening system stability
long_term_opportunities: Strong architectural foundation enables systematic improvement
High orthogonality supports scalable intervention strategies

required_inputs: Agent 1: Keyword index and semantic domains
Agent 2: Balanced categories with orthogonality metrics
Agent 3: Presence matrix with asymmetry detection
Agent 4: Trust Debt grades and Process Health scores
Agent 5: Timeline analysis and development phases
validation_criteria: All 6 upstream agents must have valid JSON output
Matrix dimensions must match category count
Grade calculations must include numeric values

agent_7_needs: Cold spot analysis with specific ratios
